definition: fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure

sentences.english: Once the crop has rooted in this soil, it should grow well.
sentences.chinese: 稼在这肥沃的土壤里生了根，就会生长很茂盛。

sentences.english: The pampas are still among the most fecund lands in the world.
sentences.chinese: 南美大草原仍然是世界上最肥沃的土地之一。

sentences.english: Thus the darkness, the mystery of life can be fruitful.
sentences.chinese: 因此，这黑暗，这生命的神秘，可以是肥沃的。

sentences.english: The trees have rooted in the rich soil.
sentences.chinese: 树木在肥沃的土壤里已经扎根。

sentences.english: These love moist, rich soil but also thrive in large pots.
sentences.chinese: 它们性喜湿润肥沃的土壤，在大盆里也长势可人。

sentences.english: Damselfish use the resulting gardens of algae for feeding and producing young.
sentences.chinese: 少女鱼利用肥沃的海藻来喂养和生产幼仔。

sentences.english: Tea grows well in these fertile mountain fields.
sentences.chinese: 茶树在这片肥沃的山地上长得很好。

sentences.english: So the valleys that cut through the mountains are extremely fertile.
sentences.chinese: 那些截断山丘的谷地都是非常肥沃的。

sentences.english: The southern polder area of China has fertility soil, variegated rivers and plentiful natural resources.
sentences.chinese: 我国南方圩区土壤肥沃，水网密布，资源丰富。

sentences.english: Lishui Town, is located in the hilly areas Whitehead, fertile land.
sentences.chinese: 白石水镇地处丘陵地带，土地肥沃。

sentences.english: City culture is the rich soil for hastening new writings.
sentences.chinese: 城市文化是催生文学新样式的肥沃土壤。

sentences.english: A lot of rich land has changed into desert, leaving only sand.
sentences.chinese: 许多肥沃的土地已经变成了沙漠，留下的仅是黄沙。

sentences.english: A cow grazes on a paddy of rich three-month-old rice.
sentences.chinese: 一头黄牛在一块种植了三个月的肥沃稻田里吃草。

sentences.english: A wealth of grasses covered the rich earth, like a green carpet.
sentences.chinese: 丰盛的草盖满了肥沃的土地，像一层绿色的地毯。

sentences.english: She also objected to the project 'cutting large swaths through huge parcels of productive farmland.'
sentences.chinese: 她还反对项目占据了大片肥沃农田中的土地。

sentences.english: Strawberries grow well in loamy soil that lets water pass through easily.
sentences.chinese: 草莓在早些时候交过水的肥沃土壤中是较好成长的。

definition: to clear a wild area for cultivation/to put under the plow
